list_definition.definition: a type of large bird which cannot fly.

list_ex_of_english: The name comes from the common (but false) legend that ostriches bury their heads in the sand to avoid danger.
All the farms surveyed did not have regular deworming programmes for their ostriches.
They currently give the impression of being ostriches hiding their heads in the sand.
They are not ostriches burying their heads in the sand.
I am sure that other countries will exploit it, and we must not be ostriches and put our heads in the sand.
What happens if a farmer diversifies by breeding ostriches or deer?
However, we do not solve problems by being ostriches and refusing to look problems in the face.
They put their heads in the sand like ostriches, and as they were not ostriches, of course they fell.
